title: Unified storage format fix
details: In v1.6.2.2, the storage format changed from container-aware format to unified format. The unified format uses `storageValue.tabs` array instead of `storageValue.containers` or `storageValue.quickTabs`. The SyncCoordinator._extractQuickTabsFromStorage() method must check for the unified format FIRST (storageValue.tabs) before checking legacy formats. This fix is critical for cross-tab sync to work correctly.
